title: Quantum Computing: The Holy Grail Of The Information Age
teaser: Some of the biggest technology companies are working to build a computer powerful enough to solve complex mathematical riddles.
contentencoded:
Technology companies are working to build a computer powerful enough to solve complex mathematical riddles or sort through the universe of data collected about us. From the Here & Now Contributors Network, Todd Bookman of WHYY explains the challenges.

  • Read more on this story via WHYY

Reporter

  • Todd Bookman, reporter for WHYY in Philadelphia. He tweets @toddbookman.
